other_tests.findings: Normal biventricular function, a large pedunculated mass on the atrial side of the tricuspid valve, and moderate tricuspid regurgitation.
Early microbubble appearance on the left side of the heart indicating intra-cardiac shunting.

other_tests.procedure_name: Operative resection of the tricuspid-valve mass and closure of patent foramen ovale
other_tests.findings: A poorly organized thrombus with extensive calcification was found on microscopic examination.
